div.p: Panephremmis, son of Horos, the son of Stotoetis, of those from the village of Soknopaiou Nesos, Herakleides division of the Arsinoite nome. I acknowledge that I have sold to Sata[b]ous, son of [P]aneph[r]emmis, from the same village of Soknopaiou Nesos, a fully grown female camel branded on the right haunch with [.]Η and I have received the price agreed upon of six hundred silver drachmas, = 600 drachmas. Year 5 of A[nt]oninus Caesar, the lord, Me[cheir] 3.
